content.rendered:
Directed by Sumanth Radhakrishnan

Written by Sumanth Radhakrishnan

Star Aishwarya. Ajay. Lollusabha Anthony. Pallavaram Aravin. Mint Bhaskar. Korukkupettai Charles. Rana Edwin. Kalairani. Krrish Kumar. Bava Lakshmanan. Ravi Mariya (Adhirshtalakshmi’s Father). Munishkanth. Namo Narayana. Nassar (Father Kuriakose). Aranthangi Nisha (Ghost). Sahitha Rai. Mundasupatti Ramdoss. Savitha Roy. Mirchi Saba. Sambiya. Sandhya. Sathish. Ashok Selvan (Kathir). Priya Bhavani Shankar (Adhirshtalakshmi). Gym Surendar . Adithya Thangirilla. Rahul Thatha. Yogi (Vijay Tv Yogi)

Language Kannada .Tamil

Producers Trident Arts

Production Trident Arts
